ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: on the Day when the secrets are sought out
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day all secrets are examined
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On the Day when man's deepest secrets shall be put to the test
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when all secrets will be made public,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A day when the secrets will be examined.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Day when all the secrets will be examined.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On the day when hidden things shall be made manifest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: upon the day when the secrets are tried,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when hidden thoughts shall be searched out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On the Day when secrets are disclosed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On a Day whereon secrets shall be out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: on the day when the secrets are examined
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Day that (all) things secret will be tested,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Day when all the secrets (deeds, prayers, fasting, etc.) will be examined (as to their truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: on the Day when consciences are examined,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when the secrets are disclosed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:9] on the day when [all] secrets, the hidden convictions and intentions of the hearts, are inspected, [when] they are examined and revealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On the day when hidden thoughts shall be searched out) when all the secrets that a person knows, and no one else other than him knows, become manifest.
